page.title: 11Lamorbey Parish Churches.
page.content: {Church of the Good Shepard & Church of { the Holy Redeemer, Lamorbey.} Vicar: Rev. Gerald Cuncliffe. Curate: Rev. David Preston. Other functions: Mothers Guild, play group & Cubs, Guides etc. { Sunday Services: 8.00 a.m. Holy Communion (Redeemer) 9.30 a.m. Sung Eucharist (Redeemer) 10.30 a.m. Sung Eucharist (Sheperd) 6.30 p.m. Sung Evensong (Redeemer) Sunday School 9.30 a.m. (Redeemer) Holy Baptism 1st & 3rd Sunday 3.00 p.m { Weekday Services: Mattins & Evensong Daily 8.30a.m/5 p.m Monday Holy Communion 9.30 a.m. (R) Wednesday Holy Communion 9.45 a.m. (S) Thursday Holy Communion 10.30 a.m. (R) Friday Holy Communion 12.30 p.m. (S) Wedding & Baptism interviews etc. Mon 7-8 p.m. (R) ; Thurs 7-7.30 p.m. (S) ; or by appointment with clergy.
